data.title: PRO PLAYERS ASSOCIATION

PRO PLAYERS ASSOCIATION receives prestigious award for transparency!

Pro Players Association has earned the GuideStar Exchange Seal, demonstrating our commitment to transparency. GuideStar the leading authority on nonprofits has awarded us with their Silver Star for continuing to provide up-to-date concise information regarding the operations of our organization. The honor has been bestowed upon Pro Players Association for the 12th consecutive year.

I.R.S. 501C3 DECLARATION LETTER

COLORADO SECRETARY OF STATE CERTIFICATE of GOOD STANDING
